body.name: OTOSTAR 18x18 Pillow Inserts Throw Pillow Inserts Set of 4 18 x 18 Inches Bedding Pillow Inserts Square White Decorative Throw Pillows Form Pillow Stuffer for Couch Sofa Bed Pillow Filler (White)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 11 hrs 18 mins
features: ✅PREMIUM MATERIAL - Our pillow insert filled and made with high-quality 7D fiber, better than ordinary filler. So it does a good job keeping the shape brilliantly.The outer layer is made of soft and durable polyester fiber.

✅SIZE - 18" x 18",pack of 4,Each square pillow measures 18 by 18 inches.Pillow cover a little bit smaller than this size may reach the best performance of the insert. OTOSTAR 4 pack throw pillow inserts make shipment by vacuum packing, you need to let them naturally recover for a few days, or exposure in the sun for one day, and then they would restore fluffy.

✅GREAT DECORATIVE PILLOWS INSERTS: Easily fluffy up to regally display your pillow covers. You could change your pillow covers which you like to go well with any home decor in different seasons. Versatile for bedding, couch, sofa, office, Living room,car etc. It will add color to your space and make the space radiate with vitality.

✅SOFT BUT SUPPORTIVE: Plump enough for lumbar support.High-quality material which makes you feel comfortable and provides suitable support for the neck. It is skin-friendly, elastic and durable in use. You will feel great to lay your head on or use as a back support in a chair or sofa.

✅GREAT GIFT IDEA: Set of 4 PILLOW INSERTS with gift box, With zipper closure on one side, makes a great gift for anyone who enjoys comfortable life.Whether a Valentine's Day gift,Christmas gift, birthday gift or anniversary present.Give your friends, family, children, and yourself these throw pillows to express the best wishes. Present them to your friend who just moved as the perfect house-warming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised at the nice fabric used on these pillows; durable, good thickness and lovely scenes. I didn’t expect that since they were so inexpensive. Very Nice! I recommend buying!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pump Perfection: Throw Pillow Review
reviews.reviewText: The throw pillow inserts I recently purchased have exceeded my expectations in every way. Their exceptional quality and versatility have made them an indispensable addition to my home decor.First and foremost, the plumpness of these inserts is impressive. They provide just the right amount of support, creating a full and inviting appearance for my throw pillows. The high-quality filling ensures they maintain their shape and loft even after extended use, eliminating the need for constant fluffing.The craftsmanship of these inserts is evident in the stitching and construction. The seams are strong and durable, preventing any unraveling or fraying. This level of attention to detail assures me that these inserts are built to last, withstanding daily use without compromising their integrity.Additionally, these inserts are easy to care for. They hold up remarkably well in the wash, and after drying, they bounce back to their original plumpness. This convenience makes maintenance a breeze, ensuring that my throw pillows always look fresh and inviting.In conclusion, these throw pillow inserts have elevated the comfort and appearance of my living space to a whole new level. Their impeccable quality, durability, and versatility make them a standout choice for anyone looking to enhance their home decor. If you're in search of high-quality inserts that deliver both support and style, I wholeheartedly recommend giving these a try. They are a true investment in comfort and aesthetics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thin but good quality
reviews.reviewText: Used to fill Christmas throw pillows. I used 2 per pillow cover, since they were too thin with just one. The quality of the filler and fabric was good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Christmas pillow covers w/pillow inserts
reviews.reviewText: These are very well made and an excellent price, especially since they come with the pillow inserts. I had them setting on an outdoor love seat and the looked adorable. I definitely recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Decoration
reviews.reviewText: I bought these pillows to change out for the Holiday Seasons with my covers...they work great for that. They are very soft and the perfect size to display your holiday cheer on furniture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: "These pillow stuffers are not worth your money! Don't waste your time buying them. Instead, head to Joanne's Fabric and get high-quality ones. The ones I purchased were completely flat, and I had to buy another set just to make them work for my pillow. I am extremely disappointed with my purchase and I strongly advise buyers to be careful of how flat they are as fillers for couch pillow covers."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars not enough stuffing/filling
reviews.reviewText: They don't have enough filling. I ended up emptying the filling from one pillow and adding it to the other three. I'll have to buy polyfil to fill the 4th insert. The directions say to give it time for the pillow inserts to fluff up, to plump them with your hands, to dry them in a clothes dryer, or to leave them in the sun and they should fluff up. I tried all those things. They need more stuffing. Disappointing.
